member.summary: Initializes the attributes from the bitmap.

member.summary: Gets the width in pixels.

member.summary: Gets the type.

member.summary: Gets the orientation.

member.summary: Gets the alignment in bytes.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginRasterStreamAttributes.PixelAspectRatio
member.summary: Gets the pixel aspect ratio.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat
member.summary: Common raster band layouts that may be contained within a raster dataset. Each pixel of the raster will contain the bands defined by the layout in the specified order. A typical color raster image will have an RGB raster format.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatRed
member.summary: The format of the raster is a single band consisting of red values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatGreen
member.summary: The format of the raster is a single band consisting of green values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatBlue
member.summary: The format of the raster is a single band consisting of blue values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatAlpha
member.summary: The format of the raster is a single band consisting of alpha values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatRgb
member.summary: The format of the raster is three bands consisting of red, green, and blue values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatBgr
member.summary: The format of the raster is three bands consisting of blue, green, and red values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatRgba
member.summary: The format of the raster is four bands consisting of red, green, blue, and alpha values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatBgra
member.summary: The format of the raster is four bands consisting of blue, green, red, and alpha values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatLuminance
member.summary: The format of the raster is a single band consisting of luminance values.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormat.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterFormatLuminanceAlpha
member.summary: The format of the raster is two bands consisting of luminance and alpha values.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType
member.summary: The type of data contained within each band of a raster dataset.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeUnsignedByte
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with an unsigned byte.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeByte
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with a byte.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeUnsignedShort
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with an unsigned short.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeShort
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with a short.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeUnsignedInt
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with an unsigned int.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeInt
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with an int.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeFloat
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with a float.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterType.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterTypeDouble
member.summary: Each value contained within a band can be represented with a double.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterOrientation
member.summary: The vertical orientation of the raster.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterOrientation.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterOrientationTopToBottom
member.summary: The raster has a top to bottom orientation.

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginRasterOrientation.eStkGraphicsPluginRasterOrientationBottomToTop
member.summary: The raster has a bottom to top orientation.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginRasterStream
member.summary: A raster that is updated dynamically.

member.summary: Configure the raster attributes, such as width, height, format, etc. Called after the object has been created.

member.summary: Gets an interface to set a raster from a safe array.

member.summary: An interface to set a raster from a bitmap.

member.summary: Set a raster from an array.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStream
member.summary: A projection that is updated dynamically.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStream.OnGetFirstProjection(AGI.STKUtil.IAgDate,AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext)
member.summary: Configure the projection stream update delta, field of view, etc. You can change the frustum attributes at any time in OnGetNextProjection.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStream.OnGetNextProjection(AGI.STKUtil.IAgDate,AGI.STKUtil.IAgDate,AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext)
member.summary: Update the projection stream update delta, field of view, etc.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext
member.summary: Configure the projection attributes, such as field of view, near plane, far plane, etc.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.GetPosition
member.summary: Gets a position of the projection in the central body's fixed reference frame. The value is a one-dimensional array with three elements representing X, Y and Z (in meters).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.GetPositionInSystem(AGI.STKUtil.IAgDate,AGI.STKVgt.IAgCrdnSystem)
member.summary: Gets a position of the projection in the central body's fixed reference frame. The value is a one-dimensional array with three elements representing X, Y and Z (in meters).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.GetPositionInSystemAtEpoch(System.Double,AGI.STKVgt.IAgCrdnSystem)
member.summary: Gets a position of the projection in the central body's fixed reference frame. The value is a one-dimensional array with three elements representing X, Y and Z (in meters).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.SetPosition(System.Array@)
member.summary: Sets a new position of the projection. The position is in the central body's fixed reference frame. The input is a one-dimensional array which contains three elements X, Y and Z that define the new position (in meters).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.SetPositionInSystem(AGI.STKUtil.IAgDate,AGI.STKVgt.IAgCrdnSystem,System.Array@)
member.summary: Sets a new position of the projection. The position is in the central body's fixed reference frame. The input is a one-dimensional array which contains three elements X, Y and Z that define the new position (in meters).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.SetPositionInSystemAtEpoch(System.Double,AGI.STKVgt.IAgCrdnSystem,System.Array@)
member.summary: Sets a new position of the projection. The position is in the specified reference frame. The input is a one-dimensional array which contains three elements X, Y and Z that define the new position (in meters).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.GetOrientation
member.summary: Gets an orientation of the projection. The value is a one-dimensional array representing a quaternion (X, Y, Z and W).

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.SetOrientation(System.Array@)
member.summary: Sets a new orientation of the projection. The value is a one-dimensional array representing a quaternion (X, Y, Z and W).

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.UpdateDeltaInSecs
member.summary: Gets the update interval in seconds.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.FieldOfViewVertical
member.summary: Gets the vertical field of view.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.FieldOfViewHorizontal
member.summary: Gets the horizontal field of view.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.NearPlane
member.summary: Gets the near plane distance.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginProjectionStreamContext.FarPlane
member.summary: Gets the far plane distance.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlay
member.summary: A base class for custom globe overlay plugins. Your class must derive from the interface to add custom globe overlays.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlay.OnInitialize(System.Object,AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext)
member.summary: Called automatically when imagery is being added to the globe. Use the Context object to initialize the imagery extents, specify a Tiler object, projection, translucency, etc. The Scene is the scene the imagery is being added to.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlay.OnUninitialize(System.Object,AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext)
member.summary: Called automatically when imagery is being removed from the globe. The Scene is the scene the imagery is being removed from.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlay.Read(System.Array@,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext)
member.summary: Reads a tile for the specified extent and data. Set the raster through the context. Extent is the extent of the tile, Data is a user-specified data for the tile (valid only if Tiler was provided). Returns true if the operation was successful.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlay.GetURI
member.summary: Gets the URI, if applicable.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext
member.summary: Configure a custom image globe overlay. Set the extent, tiler, projection, etc.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.Extent
member.summary: Gets the cartographic extent that represents the area covered by the GlobeOverlay. The array elements are arranged in the order west longitude, south latitude, east longitude, north latitude.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.Tiler
member.summary: Gets a custom tiler, if the plugin requires it. The tiler is used to control which extents are requested during a call to Read.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.IsTranslucent
member.summary: Gets whether the overlay contains translucent imagery.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.MaximumMetersPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the maximum resolution of the inlay in meters per pixel.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.Projection
member.summary: Gets the map projection. Valid values are mercator and equidistant cylindical.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.Translucency
member.summary: Gets the translucency value for the image. The translucency is between 0 and 1, where 0 is fully opaque and 1 is invisible.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.UseAltitudeBasedTranslucency
member.summary: Gets whether to use altitude to determine the translucency value for the image or not.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.AltitudeBasedTranslucencyLowerTranslucency
member.summary: Gets the lower translucency value for the image.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.AltitudeBasedTranslucencyUpperTranslucency
member.summary: Gets the upper translucency value for the image.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.AltitudeBasedTranslucencyLowerAltitude
member.summary: Gets the lower altitude bound used to calculate translucency for the image.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.AltitudeBasedTranslucencyUpperAltitude
member.summary: Gets the upper altitude bound used to calculate translucency for the image.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.RasterAsBitmap
member.summary: Get an interface to set a raster from a bitmap.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.RasterAsBits
member.summary: Get an interface to set a raster from an array.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginCustomImageGlobeOverlayContext.RasterAsOleAuto
member.summary: Get an interface to set a raster from a safe array.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTiler
member.summary: Specifies a cartographic tiling scheme for a custom image globe overlay.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTiler.GetRootTile
member.summary: Gets the root tile of the tree.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTiler.GetTiles(AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile,AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTileCollection)
member.summary: Gets the child tiles of parentTile.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile
member.summary: Represents individual custom globe overlay tile and its properties.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile.Extent
member.summary: Gets the extent of the tile in radians.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the tile in pixels.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the tile in pixels.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile.Children
member.summary: Gets the number of child tiles.

member.name: P:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTile.Data
member.summary: Gets the user data that is stored for each tile. This is used to store tiler specific data.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTileCollection
member.summary: A collection of tiles used to get the children of a tiler.

member.summary: Add a tile to the collection.

member.summary: Remove tile at index from the collection.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTileCollection.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get tile at index.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.IAgStkGraphicsPluginTileCollection.GetCount
member.summary: Get the number of tiles in the collection.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginMapProjection
member.summary: The projection of the pixel data returned from a CustomImageGlobeOverlay.

member.summary: Mercator projection

member.name: F:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins.AgEStkGraphicsPluginMapProjection.eStkGraphicsPluginMapProjectionEquidistantCylindrical
member.summary: Equidistant Cylindrical projection

member.summary: Allows a custom globe overlay plugin to provide more information about itself.

member.summary: Gets the name of the plugin instance.

member.summary: Gets the description of the plugin instance.

member.summary: Returns an instance of the STK Object Model Root Object.

member.summary: The Graphics Plugin Site which allows access to the STK Object Model.

member.summary: Send a message to the message viewer.

member.summary: Returns the site name calling the plugin.

member.name: T:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins._IAgStkGraphicsPluginGlobeOverlaySite
member.summary: The Graphics Plugin Site which allows access to the STK Object Model and control the overlay cache.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins._IAgStkGraphicsPluginGlobeOverlaySite.Message(AGI.Plugin.AgEUtLogMsgType,System.String)
member.summary: Send a message to the message viewer.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins._IAgStkGraphicsPluginGlobeOverlaySite.Reload
member.summary: Reloads the image data associated with this instance. Preserves the current image data until new image data replaces it.

member.name: M:AGI.STKGraphics.Plugins._IAgStkGraphicsPluginGlobeOverlaySite.ClearCache
member.summary: Clears the image data cache associated with this instance. This is equivalent to deleting and re-adding the overlay.

member.summary: Returns the site name calling the plugin.

member.summary: Returns an instance of the STK Object Model Root Object.

member.summary: Clears the image data cache associated with this instance. This is equivalent to deleting and re-adding the overlay.
